Functions

PDS_DataServerState_t PDS_SetToDefault (void)
 Writes default values of parameters to EEPROM.
void PDS_FlushData (void)
 Must be called only from APL_TaskHandler() function.
Function forces writing data from config server to eeprom. After return from function all Config Server data are stored into EEPROM.

Detailed Description

The header file describes the Persistence Data Server interface.

Definition in file pdsDataServer.h.

Enumeration Type Documentation

enum PDS_DataServerState_t

PDS state result after a command call.

Enumerator:
PDS_SUCCESS 
  • Command completed successfully
PDS_EEPROM_ERROR 
  • EEPROM error occured
PDS_CRC_ERROR 
  • Wrong CRC
PDS_INVALID_REQUEST 
  • Some parameters are wrong
PDS_EEPROM_BUSY 
  • EEPROM is busy

Definition at line 30 of file pdsDataServer.h.

Function Documentation

PDS_DataServerState_t PDS_SetToDefault ( void   ) 

Writes default values of parameters to EEPROM.

Returns:
- PDS state as a result of setting parameters to default state

void PDS_FlushData ( void   ) 

Must be called only from APL_TaskHandler() function.
Function forces writing data from config server to eeprom. After return from function all Config Server data are stored into EEPROM.

PDS_DataServerState_t PDS_ReadUserData ( uint16_t  offset,
uint8_t *  data,
uint16_t  length,
void(*)(void)  callback 
)

Must be called only from APL_TaskHandler() function.
Reads data from user area of EEPROM.

Parameters:
[in] offset - data offset
[in] data - pointer to user data area
[in] length - data length
[in] callback - callback method. If callback is NULL, then data will be read syncronous.
Returns:
- PDS state as a result of data reading operation

PDS_DataServerState_t PDS_WriteUserData ( uint16_t  offset,
uint8_t *  data,
uint16_t  length,
void(*)(void)  callback 
)

Must be called only from APL_TaskHandler() function.
Writes data to user area of EEPROM.

Parameters:
[in] offset - data offset
[in] data - pointer to user data area
[in] length - data length
[in] callback - callback method. If callback is NULL, then data will be write syncronous.
Returns:
- PDS state as a result of data writing operation
